page.title: 18Lanchester Agricultural Show
page.content: round.I ran all the way but it was very hard because of the other runners.After we finished we got medals and drinks and hotdogs.The route was seven and a quarter miles.As we approach the finish we are guided by officals.Trophies are won by the first man,the first woman,the first girl, the first boy,the first veteran (over40) and first B.B boy home.Last year Micheal Wright won in 36.33 mins. {Lanchester Agricultural Show. On July 7th the 34th annual Lanchester Agricultural Show was held in a large field just outside the village.There were horse jumping events, various dog showing events, best goat competition and many small animal competitions. Children enjoyed the side shows and fun rides. In the industrial tent were many exhibits in the cookery and handcraft
